title: [BUG] In k8s cluster, pod restart, the redis cluster is not working properly and cannot repair itself.
body:
**Describe the bug**
For redis-cluster . When deploying a redis cluster in k8s, the ip may change if the cluster pod restarts. When redis uses gossip for messaging, it happens that part of the ip fails to connect.
